text.arab: فَاِذَا جَاۤءَتْهُمُ الْحَسَنَةُ قَالُوْا لَنَا هٰذِهٖ ۚوَاِنْ تُصِبْهُمْ سَيِّئَةٌ يَّطَّيَّرُوْا بِمُوْسٰى وَمَنْ مَّعَهٗۗ  اَلَآ اِنَّمَا طٰۤىِٕرُهُمْ عِنْدَ اللّٰهِ وَلٰكِنَّ اَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ

transliteration.en: Fa izaa jaaa'at humul hasanatu qaaloo lanaa haazihee wa in tusibhum saiyi'atuny yattaiyaroo bi Moosaa wa mam ma'ah; alaaa innamaa taaa'iruhum 'indal laahi wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon
transliteration.id: fa iżā jā'athumul-ḥasanatu qālū lanā hāżihī, wa in tuṣibhum sayyi'atuy yaṭṭayyarū bimūsā wa mam ma‘ah(ū), alā innamā ṭā'iruhum ‘indallāhi wa lākinna aksṡarahum lā ya‘lamūn(a).

translation.en: But when good came to them, they said, "This is ours [by right]." And if a bad [condition] struck them, they saw an evil omen in Moses and those with him. Unquestionably, their fortune is with Allah, but most of them do not know.
translation.id: Kemudian apabila kebaikan (kemakmuran) datang kepada mereka, mereka berkata, “Ini adalah karena (usaha) kami.” Dan jika mereka ditimpa kesusahan, mereka lemparkan sebab kesialan itu kepada Musa dan pengikutnya. Ketahuilah, sesungguhnya nasib mereka di tangan Allah, namun kebanyakan mereka tidak mengetahui.

text.arab: وَقَالُوْا مَهْمَا تَأْتِنَا بِهٖ مِنْ اٰيَةٍ لِّتَسْحَرَنَا بِهَاۙ فَمَا نَحْنُ لَكَ بِمُؤْمِنِيْنَ

transliteration.en: Wa qaaloo mahmaa taatinaa bihee min Aayatil litasharanaa bihaa famaa nahnu laka bimu'mineen
transliteration.id: wa qālū mahmā ta'tinā bihī min āyatil litasḥaranā bihā, famā naḥnu laka bimu'minīn(a).

translation.en: And they said, "No matter what sign you bring us with which to bewitch us, we will not be believers in you."
translation.id: Dan mereka berkata (kepada Musa), “Bukti apa pun yang engkau bawa kepada kami untuk menyihir kami, kami tidak akan beriman kepadamu.”

text.arab: فَاَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ الطُّوْفَانَ وَالْجَرَادَ وَالْقُمَّلَ وَالضَّفَادِعَ وَالدَّمَ اٰيٰتٍ مُّفَصَّلٰتٍۗ فَاسْتَكْبَرُوْا وَكَانُوْا قَوْمًا مُّجْرِمِيْنَ

transliteration.en: Fa arsalnaa 'alaihimut toofaana waljaraada walqum mala waddafaadi'a waddama Aayaatim mufassalaatin fastakbaroo wa kaanoo qawmam mujrimeen
transliteration.id: fa arsalnā ‘alaihimuṭ-ṭūfāna wal-jarāda wal-qummala waḍ-ḍafādi‘a wad-dama āyātim mufaṣṣalāt(in), fastakbarū wa kānū qaumam mujrimīn(a).

translation.en: So We sent upon them the flood and locusts and lice and frogs and blood as distinct signs, but they were arrogant and were a criminal people.
translation.id: Maka Kami kirimkan kepada mereka topan, belalang, kutu, katak dan darah (air minum berubah menjadi darah) sebagai bukti-bukti yang jelas, tetapi mereka tetap menyombongkan diri dan mereka adalah kaum yang berdosa.

text.arab: وَلَمَّا وَقَعَ عَلَيْهِمُ الرِّجْزُ قَالُوْا يٰمُوْسَى ادْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ بِمَا عَهِدَ عِنْدَكَۚ  لَىِٕنْ كَشَفْتَ عَنَّا الرِّجْزَ لَنُؤْمِنَنَّ لَكَ وَلَنُرْسِلَنَّ مَعَكَ بَنِيْٓ اِسْرَاۤءِيْلَ ۚ

transliteration.en: Wa lammaa waqa'a 'alaihimur rijzu qaaloo ya Moosad-u lanaa rabbaka bimaa 'ahida 'indaka la'in kashafta 'annar rijza lanu 'minanna laka wa lanursilanna ma'aka Banee Israaa'eel
transliteration.id: wa lammā waqa‘a ‘alihimur-rijzu qālū yā mūsad‘u lanā rabbaka bimā ‘ahida ‘indak(a), la'in kasyafta ‘annar-rijza lanu'minanna laka wa lanursilanna ma‘aka banī isrā'īl(a).

translation.en: And when the punishment descended upon them, they said, "O Moses, invoke for us your Lord by what He has promised you. If you [can] remove the punishment from us, we will surely believe you, and we will send with you the Children of Israel."
translation.id: Dan ketika mereka ditimpa azab (yang telah diterangkan itu) mereka pun berkata, “Wahai Musa! Mohonkanlah untuk kami kepada Tuhanmu sesuai dengan janji-Nya kepadamu. Jika engkau dapat menghilangkan azab itu dari kami, niscaya kami akan beriman kepadamu dan pasti akan kami biarkan Bani Israil pergi bersamamu.”

text.arab: فَلَمَّا كَشَفْنَا عَنْهُمُ الرِّجْزَ اِلٰٓى اَجَلٍ هُمْ بَالِغُوْهُ اِذَا هُمْ يَنْكُثُوْنَ

transliteration.en: Falammaa kashafnaa 'anhumur rijza ilaaa ajalin hum baalighoohu izaa hum yankusoon
transliteration.id: falammā kasyafnā ‘anhumur-rijza ilā ajalin hum bāligūhu iżā hum yankuṡūn(a).

translation.en: But when We removed the punishment from them until a term which they were to reach, then at once they broke their word.
translation.id: Tetapi setelah Kami hilangkan azab itu dari mereka hingga batas waktu yang harus mereka penuhi ternyata mereka ingkar janji.

text.arab: فَانْتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ فَاَغْرَقْنٰهُمْ فِى الْيَمِّ بِاَنَّهُمْ كَذَّبُوْا بِاٰيٰتِنَا وَكَانُوْا عَنْهَا غٰفِلِيْنَ

transliteration.en: Fantaqamnaa minhum fa aghraqnaahum kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa wa kaanoo 'anhaa ghaafileen
transliteration.id: fantaqamnā minhum fa agraqnāhum fil-yammi bi'annahum każżabū bi'āyātinā wa kānū ‘anhā gāfilīn(a).

translation.en: So We took retribution from them, and We drowned them in the sea because they denied Our signs and were heedless of them.
translation.id: Maka Kami hukum sebagian di antara mereka, lalu Kami tenggelamkan mereka di laut karena mereka telah mendustakan ayat-ayat Kami dan melalaikan ayat-ayat Kami.

text.arab: وَاَوْرَثْنَا الْقَوْمَ الَّذِيْنَ كَانُوْا يُسْتَضْعَفُوْنَ مَشَارِقَ الْاَرْضِ وَمَغَارِبَهَا الَّتِيْ بٰرَكْنَا فِيْهَاۗ وَتَمَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ الْحُسْنٰى عَلٰى بَنِيْٓ اِسْرَاۤءِيْلَۙ بِمَا صَبَرُوْاۗ وَدَمَّرْنَا مَا كَانَ يَصْنَعُ فِرْعَوْنُ وَقَوْمُهٗ وَمَا كَانُوْا يَعْرِشُوْنَ

transliteration.en: Wa awrasnal qawmal lazeena kaanoo yustad'afoona mashaariqal ardi wa maghaari bahal latee baaraknaa feehaa wa tammat kalimatu Rabbikal husnaa 'alaa Baneee Israaa'eela bimaa sabaroo wa dammarnaa maa kaana yasna'u Fir'awnu wa qawmuhoo wa maa kaanoo ya'rishoon
transliteration.id: wa auraṡnal-qaumal-lażīna kānū yustaḍ‘afūna masyāriqal-arḍi wa magāribahal-latī bāraknā fīhā, wa tammat kalimatu rabbikal-ḥusnā ‘alā banī isrā'īl(a), bimā ṣabarū, wa dammarnā mā kāna yaṣna‘u fir‘aunu wa qaumuhū wa mā kānū ya‘risyūn(a).

translation.en: And We caused the people who had been oppressed to inherit the eastern regions of the land and the western ones, which We had blessed. And the good word of your Lord was fulfilled for the Children of Israel because of what they had patiently endured. And We destroyed [all] that Pharaoh and his people were producing and what they had been building.
translation.id: Dan Kami wariskan kepada kaum yang tertindas itu, bumi bagian timur dan bagian baratnya yang telah Kami berkahi. Dan telah sempurnalah firman Tuhanmu yang baik itu (sebagai janji) untuk Bani Israil disebabkan kesabaran mereka. Dan Kami hancurkan apa yang telah dibuat Fir‘aun dan kaumnya dan apa yang telah mereka bangun.
